channel.title: Alia Musica on Franklin Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Alia Musica on Franklin Chen

item.title: Alia Musica concert including flutist Robert Dick
item.description:
Abby and I attended Alia Musica’s spring concert, featuring older as well as brand new music. Robert Dick made an appearance to repeat his famous composition, [Meristem], which had played in his solo recital also.

Henry Doktorski played two pieces in this program with Alia Music as accordionist.

And so Robert Dick’s Pittsburgh tour came to an end. What a week it’s been!

(Update of 2014-01-16)

This is an unfinished post that is one of many in the past two years that lay unfinished because I had originally planned to write a very detailed report but never got around to it. I decided that I might as well release all these unfinished posts rather than leave them completely out of the record.

item.title: Energetic Robert Dick solo flute recital in Pittsburgh with Alia Musica
item.description:
I attended Robert Dick’s solo flute recital in Pittsburgh with Alia Musica.

It was a real treat. A real master of the flute.

Here he was during a sound check:
